title: Cant duo new season?
body: Season just started but i cant duo with same rank last season player? We played whole season 7 together(same rank etc) and now we cant duo, why?

replies.body: What was the Summoner name of the friend you were trying to duo with? I can do my best to look into it and see what might be going on, but it might be worth your time to hit up the game agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as well to see what's going on.
Sanako. I was trying duo with many of my friends none could i invite(Everyone with same elo)

Hmmmm yea strange. I double checked both of your accounts and it does look like you two *should* be able to duo with each other as far as I can tell. If it's still not letting you, I would definitely reach out to the EU agents in a ticket to see if something may not be working correctly.

i have the same issue. 

have you by any chance requested your boarder to be removed? or was it removed?
I got banned for beeing bad bassicly. {{sticker:vlad-salute}}

> [{quoted}](name=OgarneWas,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=urfzAUai,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-01-16T13:56:07.211+0000)
>
> I got banned for beeing bad bassicly. {{sticker:vlad-salute}}

ok, i guess that the issue then. for some reason duo eligibility check seems to be linked to boarder instead of previous rank.I had mine removed my request from riot support. I can only duo with unranked accounts or around that mmr. and other people got their boarders removed also.

guess only thing you can do is wait for a fix or ask riot support to give you back your boarder lol. 

i am badeed
